meta_description.title: Yoshi's Island - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island is a 1995 platform game developed and published by Nintendo for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES).Artist(s): Yoshiaki Koizumi; ‎Hisashi Nogami‎Genre(s): PlatformDirector(s): Takashi Tezuka; Toshihiko Nakago; ...‎Producer(s): Shigeru Miyamoto‎Gameplay · ‎Development · ‎Reception · ‎Legacy

people_also_ask.question: Why is Yoshis Island banned?
people_also_ask.heading: Tournament legality In all games in which it appears, Yoshi's Island is universally banned in competitive play due to its overall layout being detrimental in a serious setting, as well as the advantages it gives to already powerful characters in certain situations.21-Jun-2021
people_also_ask.title: Yoshi's Island (SSBM) - SmashWiki, the Super Smash Bros. wiki

people_also_ask.question: Is Yoshis Island a good game?
people_also_ask.heading: Nintendo's tried to re-capture the charm of Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island again and again, but the dinosaur's SNES adventure is still his best one, hands-down. Yoshi's Island is lively, clever, challenging, and fun – even though Baby Mario's scream can peel paint off walls.23-Jan-2019
people_also_ask.title: Super NES Retro Review: Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island

people_also_ask.question: Is Yoshis Island considered a Mario game?
people_also_ask.heading: Yoshi's Island is a spin-off, the same as Wario Land, Super Princess Peach, or Captain Toad: Treasure Trackers. It is not a core Mario game. It is a Yoshi game.07-Mar-2018
people_also_ask.title: The RetroBeat: Yoshi's Island is not a 'core' Mario game

people_also_ask.question: What island does Yoshi live on?
people_also_ask.heading: Yoshi's Island is the island where all of the Yoshis live peacefully. It was also revealed that this island is located the north of Koopa Kingdom, Bowser's domain.

knowledge_panel.description: super mario world 2: yoshi's island is a 1995 platform game developed and published by nintendo for the super nintendo entertainment system. to reunite baby mario with his brother luigi, who has been kidnapped by kamek, the player controls yoshi, a friendly dinosaur, through 48 levels while carrying baby mario. wikipedia
